products.name: iPhone 16 Pro
products.description: Apple iPhone 16 Pro, eSIM+SIM 8/256 ГБ, gray
products.descriptionpro: The Apple iPhone 16 Pro in a natural gray case with 256 GB of memory is a powerful and stylish flagship. It is equipped with an advanced camera system, a bright OLED screen and the fastest Apple A18 Bionic processor for flawless operation.

products.name: MacBook Air 15
products.description: Apple MacBook Air 15 Ноутбук 15.3, Apple M3 (8 CPU, 10 GPU)
products.descriptionpro: We have created the most powerful MacBook Pro ever. And it's a monster. The super-fast M3 Pro and M3 Max are Apple's first chips designed specifically for professionals. They provide phenomenal performance and surprisingly long battery life. Add to this the stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, superior camera and sound, and more ports for professional use. With this laptop, everything becomes possible.
